groupdesc: Basic theme parameters are configured here.

fields.name: template_style
fields.label: Theme Style
fields.tooltip: Select a default theme style from the list provided.

fields.name: template_homepage_mainbody_amount
fields.label: Amount of posts on the front page
fields.tooltip: You can specify amount of posts displayed on the front page

fields.name: template_homepage_mainbody_nav
fields.label: Display front page navigation
fields.tooltip: Enable the display of the post navigation on the front page.

fields.name: template_homepage_mainbody_meta
fields.label: Display post meta data on the homepage
fields.tooltip: Enable the display of the post metadata over the title on the front page.

fields.name: post_aside_state
fields.label: Post sidebar informations
fields.tooltip: Enable display of the post sidebar informations in the theme.

fields.name: email_url
fields.label: E-mail URL
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL used in the E-mail link. If you want to obfuscate your e-mail please use the 'mailto:' prefix.

fields.name: rss_url
fields.label: RSS URL
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL used in the RSS link

fields.name: breadcrumbs_state
fields.label: Conditional Breadcrumbs Display
fields.tooltip: Enable display of breadcrumbs in the theme.

fields.name: breadcrumbs_staterule
fields.label: Breadcrumbs Display
fields.tooltip: Enable display of breadcrumbs on specific pages.

fields.name: template_homepage_mainbody
fields.label: Widgets Display on Homepage
fields.tooltip: Enable the display of widgets in mainbody widget positions instead of standard blog posts on the homepage.

fields.name: template_show_author_info
fields.label: Display Author Info
fields.tooltip: Enable the display of the author information block for each content item.

fields.name: excluding_explained
fields.label: Include/Exclude specific pages or categories from showing author block

fields.name: authorinfo_exclude_include
fields.label: Include/Exclude mode
fields.tooltip: Specify if the specified articles will be included or excluded.

fields.name: authorinfo_articles
fields.label: Included/Excluded articles
fields.tooltip: Specify the list of comma-separated article IDs/titles/slugs (i.e. 2,5,34,200 or post-title1,post-title2)

fields.name: authorinfo_pages
fields.label: Included/Excluded pages
fields.tooltip: Specify the list of comma-separated page IDs/titles/slugs (i.e. 2,5,34,200 or page-title1,page-title2)

fields.name: authorinfo_categories
fields.label: Included/Excluded categories
fields.tooltip: Specify the list of comma-separated category IDs/titles/slugs (i.e. 2,5,34,200 or category-title1,category-title2)
